title: StackOverflow Blog: Does your web app need a front-end framework?
description: An introduction to what front-end frameworks do and when they're useful.

title: StackOverflow Blog: Coding 102 - Writing code other people can read
description: You can hack together syntax. Now it's time to write code your coworkers can read! An introduction to writing clean code for self-taught developers.

title: Bonusly Blog: How to Connect with Your Remote Team and Build Culture
description: Written early in the pandemic, this was my recap of cultural practices that helped keep the Bonusly team working.
